QuestData.Title: Pieces of the Past
QuestData.Description: I found a journal by a man named Bradshaw. Unfortunately it's missing many pages. Especially towards the end.$B$BIf you find enough of the pages I might be able to piece together what happened here after the Curse broke out.$B$BWho knows... maybe the people in this town found a way out. Maybe there are still survivors out there.$B$B Maybe my father is still alive.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. It will take some time, but I'll try to make sense of what we have.
